educount

wcmckee

2015-07-12 03:51

Comments

Source

ece-display: Education Counts

Python script to remix educationcounts nz govt site.

Ministery Of Education.

Display more info in one page.

Read HTML for .xlc files and download to folder

Scrape links for excel files - download excel files to folder.

Remove excel files and instead display as more friendly json object and pandas dataframe for display.

In [1]:
import bs4
import requests
import dominate
from dominate.tags import *
import os
import shutil
import json
from urlparse import urlparse
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
In [2]:
eceall = requests.get('https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz')
In [3]:
eceall.text
Out[3]:

href="https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services/collecting-information/sms_roll_returns" title="SMS Vendors">SMS Vendors</a></li>\r\n</ul></li>  <li class="second-level span9 ">\r\n  <h4><a Literacy Study">PIRLS</a></li><li class="third-level"><a href="/data-services/data-collections/pisa" title="Programme for International Student Assessment">PISA</a></li><li class="third-level"><a class="third-level"><a href="/data-services/data-collections/timss" title="Trends in International Mathematics and Science Study">TIMSS</a></li>\r\n</ul></li>  <li class="second-level span6 new-row">\r\n  <h4><a href="https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services/directories" title="Educational Directories">Educational Directories</a></h4>\r\n<ul>\r\n  <li class="third-level"><a href="/data-services/directories" title="Directories">Directories</a></li>\r\n</ul></li>\r\n  </ul>\r\n</div>  </div>\r\n</li>\r\n    </ul>\r\n  </div>\r\n</nav>\n        <div id="main-site-search">\n\n          <div class="container fixed-fluid">\n\n            <h2 class="">Search</h2>\r\n<!-- start: #site-search-form -->\r\n<form id="main-site-search-form" class="container fixed-fluid wrapper">\n\n          \n\n          \n\n          \t\t\n\n          \n\n          \n\n          \t\t\n\n          \n\n          \t\t\n          \t\t\n          <!--      \t\t\n            <!-- start: #center-content -->\n            <div id="center-content" class="span12">\n              <section id="home-content" class="">\r\n          <div class="row-fluid">\r\n            <article class="banner span8"><div class="slideshow flexslider">\r\n  <h1 class="visually-hidden">News</h1>\r\n  <ul class="slideshow-slides slides">\r\n    <li class="slideshow-slide">\r\n  <img class="slideshow-slide-image" src="https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/__data/assets/image/0016/160324/Banner-Text-1.gif" alt="" />\r\n    <div </li><li class="slideshow-slide">\r\n  <img class="slideshow-slide-image" src="https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/__data/assets/image/0011/159968/Banner-Text-3.gif" alt="" />\r\n    <div class="slideshow-slide-summary">\r\n    <div class="slideshow-slide-summary-inner">\r\n                <span>Main Activity of School Leavers in First Year After Leaver School (2010)</span>\r\n         </div>\r\n  </div>\r\n  </li><li class="slideshow-slide">\r\n  <img class="slideshow-slide-image" src="https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/__data/assets/image/0012/159969/Banner-Text-5.gif" alt="" />\r\n    <div class="slideshow-slide-summary">\r\n    <div class="slideshow-slide-summary-inner">\r\n                <span>Ethnic composition of students in the 2012 school leaver tail 2012</span>\r\n         </div>\r\n  </div>\r\n  </li><li class="slideshow-slide">\r\n  <img class="slideshow-slide-image" src="https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/__data/assets/image/0017/160325/Banner-Text-7.gif" alt="" />\r\n    <div class="slideshow-slide-summary">\r\n    <div class="slideshow-slide-summary-inner">\r\n                <span>Education profile of young people in NZ 2012</span>\r\n         </div>\r\n  </div>\r\n  </li>\r\n  </ul>\r\n  <div class="slideshow-nav"></div>\r\n</div><!-- /.slideshow --></article>\r\n<article class="useful-links span4">\r\n  <h1>Key Pages</h1>\r\n  <ul>\r\n             <li><a href="https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services/directories" alt="School Directory" title="School Directory">Directories (includes Schools Directory)</a></li>\r\n         <li><a href="https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics/national-education" alt="Public Achievement Information (PAI)" title="Public Achievement Information (PAI)">Public Achievement Information (PAI)</a></li>\r\n         <li><a href="https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics/schooling/national-standards" alt="National Standards" title="National Standards">National Standards</a></li>\r\n         <li><a href="http://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications?SQ_PAINT_LAYOUT_NAME=all-chronological" alt="Latest Publications" title="Latest Publications">Latest Publications</a></li>\r\n         <li><a href="https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services/data-collections" alt="Data Collections" title="Data Collections">Data Collections</a></li>\r\n         <li><a href="/topics/bes" alt="BES (What Works Evidence)" title="BES (What Works Evidence)">BES (What Works Evidence)</a></li>\r\n         <li><a href="http://www.minedu.govt.nz/theMinistry/EducationInitiatives/InvestingInEducationalSuccess.aspx" alt="Investing in Educational Success" title="Investing in Educational Success">Investing in Educational Success</a></li>\r\n\r\n  </ul>\r\n</article>     \r\n          </div>\r\n        <article class="page-list">\r\n            <div class="row-fluid">\r\n            <ul>\r\n              <li class="span4">\r\n                <a id="region" href="https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region" class="item" title="Know Your Region">\r\n                  <h3>Know your region</h3>\r\n                  <p>An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.</p>\r\n                </a>\r\n              </li>\r\n\r\n<li class="span4">\r\n                <a id="school" href="https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school" class="item" title="Find a School in NZ">\r\n                  <h3>Find a school</h3>\r\n                  <p>An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.</p>\r\n                </a>\r\n              </li>\r\n\r\n<li class="span4">\r\n                <a id="ece" href="https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els" class="item" title="Find an Early Learning Service in NZ">\r\n                  <h3>Find an Early Learning Service</h3>\r\n                  <p>An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.</p>\r\n                </a>\r\n              </li>\r\n\r\n\r\n<li class="span4">\r\n                <a id="topics" href="https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics" class="item" title="Topics">\r\n                  <h3>Topics</h3>\r\n                  <p>Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.</p>\r\n                </a>\r\n              </li>\r\n<li class="span4">\r\n                <a id="indicators" href="https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators" class="item" title="Indicators">\r\n                  <h3>Indicators</h3>\r\n                  <p>Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.</p>\r\n                </a>\r\n              </li>\r\n<li class="span4">\r\n                <a id="pubs" href="https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications" class="item" title="Publications">\r\n                  <h3>Publications</h3>\r\n                  <p>Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.</p>\r\n                </a>\r\n              </li>\r\n<li class="span4">\r\n                <a id="stats" href="https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics" class="item" title="Statistics">\r\n                  <h3>Statistics</h3>\r\n                  <p>Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.</p>\r\n                </a>\r\n              </li>\r\n<li class="span4">\r\n                <a id="services" href="https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services" class="item" title="Data Services">\r\n                  <h3>Data Services</h3>\r\n                  <p>Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.</p>\r\n                </a>\r\n              </li>\r\n            </ul>\r\n          </div>\r\n          </article>\r\n</section>                          </div>\n            <!-- end: #center-content -->\n\n            <!-- start: #left-column -->\n            <aside id="left-column" class="span3   • Language use in ECE

    Statistics on language use in ECE, including tables on number of services, …
    • In [4]:
    edcounz = bs4.BeautifulSoup(eceall.text)
    In [5]:
    edu = edcounz.findAll('a')
    In [6]:
    for ed in edu:
    #slug
    print ed.text.replace(' ', '-')
    
    #text
    print ed.text
    
    #print ed.name
    #url
    print ed.attrs['href']

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

#masthead
    In [6]:
    In [7]:
    fixdict = dict()
    In [11]:
    edulen = len(edu)
    In [ ]:
    In [ ]:
    for edz in range(edulen):
    for ed in edu:
    #slug
        print ed.text.replace(' ', '-')
        urldict.update({ed.text.replace(' ', '-') : ed.attrs['href']})
    
        fixdict.update({ed.text : ed.attrs['href']})
        finaldict = dict.update({edz : fixdict}) 
        #text
        print ed.text
    
        #print ed.name
        #url
        print ed.attrs['href']

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Investing-in-Educational-Success
Investing in Educational Success
http://www.minedu.govt.nz/theMinistry/EducationInitiatives/InvestingInEducationalSuccess.aspx

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Investing-in-Educational-Success
Investing in Educational Success

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

BES-(What-Works-Evidence)
BES (What Works Evidence)
/topics/bes
Investing-in-Educational-Success
Investing in Educational Success
http://www.minedu.govt.nz/theMinistry/EducationInitiatives/InvestingInEducationalSuccess.aspx

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Investing-in-Educational-Success
Investing in Educational Success
http://www.minedu.govt.nz/theMinistry/EducationInitiatives/InvestingInEducationalSuccess.aspx

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Investing-in-Educational-Success
Investing in Educational Success
http://www.minedu.govt.nz/theMinistry/EducationInitiatives/InvestingInEducationalSuccess.aspx

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Investing-in-Educational-Success

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Investing-in-Educational-Success
Investing in Educational Success
http://www.minedu.govt.nz/theMinistry/EducationInitiatives/InvestingInEducationalSuccess.aspx

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Investing-in-Educational-Success
Investing in Educational Success
http://www.minedu.govt.nz/theMinistry/EducationInitiatives/InvestingInEducationalSuccess.aspx

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Investing-in-Educational-Success
Investing in Educational Success
http://www.minedu.govt.nz/theMinistry/EducationInitiatives/InvestingInEducationalSuccess.aspx

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Investing-in-Educational-Success
