Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Investing-in-Educational-Success
Investing in Educational Success
http://www.minedu.govt.nz/theMinistry/EducationInitiatives/InvestingInEducationalSuccess.aspx

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Investing-in-Educational-Success
Investing in Educational Success
http://www.minedu.govt.nz/theMinistry/EducationInitiatives/InvestingInEducationalSuccess.aspx

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Investing-in-Educational-Success
Investing in Educational Success
http://www.minedu.govt.nz/theMinistry/EducationInitiatives/InvestingInEducationalSuccess.aspx

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Investing-in-Educational-Success
Investing in Educational Success

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Investing-in-Educational-Success
Investing in Educational Success
http://www.minedu.govt.nz/theMinistry/EducationInitiatives/InvestingInEducationalSuccess.aspx

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Investing-in-Educational-Success
Investing in Educational Success
http://www.minedu.govt.nz/theMinistry/EducationInitiatives/InvestingInEducationalSuccess.aspx

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Investing-in-Educational-Success
Investing in Educational Success
http://www.minedu.govt.nz/theMinistry/EducationInitiatives/InvestingInEducationalSuccess.aspx

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Investing-in-Educational-Success
Investing in Educational Success
http://www.minedu.govt.nz/theMinistry/EducationInitiatives/InvestingInEducationalSuccess.aspx

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services

Know-your-region
An-online-tool-where-you-can-find-education-data-for-different-regions-or-territorial-authority.-Using-this-tool-you-can-access-data-on-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement.


Know your region
An online tool where you can find education data for different regions or territorial authority. Using this tool you can access data on student population, student engagement and student achievement.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/know-your-region

Find-a-school
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-school-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.-You-can-also-access-student-population,-student-engagement-and-student-achievement-data-for-the-school.


Find a school
An online tool where you can search for a particular school in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details. You can also access student population, student engagement and student achievement data for the school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-school

Find-an-Early-Learning-Service
An-online-tool-where-you-can-search-for-a-particular-early-learning-service/centre-in-New-Zealand-and-find-its-profile,-including-contact-details.


Find an Early Learning Service
An online tool where you can search for a particular early learning service/centre in New Zealand and find its profile, including contact details.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/find-an-els

Topics
Topics-are-compilations-of-information-around-a-specific-theme.-Themes-may-combine-Education-Sector-Indicators,-research-and-evaluation,-and-statistical-information.


Topics
Topics are compilations of information around a specific theme. Themes may combine Education Sector Indicators, research and evaluation, and statistical information.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/topics

Indicators
Education-Sector-Indicators-are-established-measures-used-to-determine-how-well-a-result-has-been-achieved-in-a-particular-area-of-interest.-For-example,-the-rate-of-formal-school-qualifications-helps-quantify-whether-students-are-succeeding-at-school.


Indicators
Education Sector Indicators are established measures used to determine how well a result has been achieved in a particular area of interest. For example, the rate of formal school qualifications helps quantify whether students are succeeding at school.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/indicators

Publications
Provides-you-access-to-research-publications-and-publications-with-a-data-or-quantitative-information-focus.


Publications
Provides you access to research publications and publications with a data or quantitative information focus.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/publications

Statistics
Provides-you-access-to-statistical-information-about-education-and-education-services.


Statistics
Provides you access to statistical information about education and education services.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/statistics

Data-Services
Provides-information-to-assist-you-to-understand-and-use-other-information-provided-on-the-website.-Information-includes,-a-glossary,-data-dictionaries,-descriptions-of-data-sources,-etc.


Data Services
Provides information to assist you to understand and use other information provided on the website. Information includes, a glossary, data dictionaries, descriptions of data sources, etc.

https://www.educationcounts.govt.nz/data-services
